con:testStep.name: DataGen product values

con:configuration.script: def addItemResponseCode = context.expand( '${DataSource for different status of products#addItemResponseCode}' ).toInteger(); return addItemResponseCode;
def submitResponseCode = context.expand( '${DataSource for different status of products#submitResponseCode}' ).toInteger(); return submitResponseCode;
def stockLevelAvailable = context.expand( '${DataSource for different status of products#stockLevelAvailable}' ).toInteger(); return stockLevelAvailable;
def stockLevelReserved = context.expand( '${DataSource for different status of products#stockLevelReserved}' ).toInteger(); return stockLevelReserved;
def mainState = context.expand( '${DataSource for different status of products#mainState}' ) return mainState;

con:testStep.name: DataGen product values - LostSold re-sale

con:configuration.script: def addItemResponseCode = context.expand( '${DataSource for different status of products - LostSold re-sale#addItemResponseCode}' ).toInteger(); return addItemResponseCode;
def submitResponseCode = context.expand( '${DataSource for different status of products - LostSold re-sale#submitResponseCode}' ).toInteger(); return submitResponseCode;
def stockLevelAvailable = context.expand( '${DataSource for different status of products - LostSold re-sale#stockLevelAvailable}' ).toInteger(); return stockLevelAvailable;
def stockLevelReserved = context.expand( '${DataSource for different status of products - LostSold re-sale#stockLevelReserved}' ).toInteger(); return stockLevelReserved;
def mainState = context.expand( '${DataSource for different status of products - LostSold re-sale#mainState}' ) return mainState;
